note:
I make and manage websites (Drupal, WordPress and Webflow mostly) and other web things. I occasionally do some writing and freelance project management. I am on the northern beaches of Sydney.

I make beer for fun and have a strange obsession with fountain pens and stationery.

Otherwise I just gibber on the internet. I was on Mastodon a few years ago but the instance doesn't seem to be around any more, so apologies if you are re-following.
